thread.title: Will Spendlove Joins Conga as Vice President of Product Marketing

author: cnbc.com
title: Will Spendlove Joins Conga as Vice President of Product Marketing
text:
Former VP of Product Marketing for Salesforce CPQ will lead Conga’s product marketing through the next stage of growth
BROOMFIELD, Colo.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Conga , a global leader in Intelligent Document Automation, today announced that cloud marketing veteran Will Spendlove has joined Conga as the company's vice president of product marketing. Spendlove joins Conga from Salesforce, where he most recently led go-to-market efforts for Salesforce CPQ and Billing products. Spendlove’s expertise in creating an engaging customer experience and driving high-growth products will support Conga’s commitment to deliver the world’s #1 intelligent document platform.
“Will joins Conga at a critical time in our journey, as we build momentum and accelerate our roadmap,” said Bob DeSantis, chief operating officer at Conga. “Will is a game changer. His extensive experience in CPQ and Salesforce will play an instrumental role in Conga’s next growth stage.”
“Today’s businesses expect a seamless experience when interacting with their customers, employees and business partners,” said Spendlove. “Conga empowers businesses to create, collaborate, deliver and manage documents, and measure engagement throughout the entire document lifecycle. As VP of Product Marketing, I look forward to helping deliver one of the most flexible, feature-rich document solutions in the market.”
During Spendlove’s career at Salesforce, he oversaw product marketing for the CPQ and Billing product lines, and also served as Head of Product Marketing for Remedyforce, an IT Help Desk built in partnership with BMC Software and Salesforce.
Prior to joining Salesforce, Spendlove worked at OpenText and Symantec where he led product marketing and sales enablement teams. He holds a bachelor’s degree in broadcast journalism from Brigham Young University and a master’s degree in business administration from the Eccles School of Management at the University of Utah. Spendlove is passionate about helping youth and currently is Board Co-Chair for Encircle, an LGBTQ family and youth resource center in Provo, Utah.
You can meet Will at Conga’s annual user conference, Conga Connect, April 3-4 in Chicago. At Conga Connect, Will will be co-presenting the company’s vision for modern B2B commerce and its approach to Intelligent Document Automation. For more details, visit congaconnect.com .
Salesforce and others are among the trademarks of salesforce.com, inc.
About Conga
Conga developed its suite of enterprise-grade Intelligent Document Automation solutions to help businesses optimize their CRM investments. The Conga Suite, which includes Conga Composer, Conga Contracts, Conga ActionGrid, and Conga Sign, simplifies and automates data, documents, contracts, signing, and reporting.
As a Salesforce Platinum ISV Partner, Conga is committed to providing its customers with enterprise-grade infrastructure, security and solutions. In fact, more than 650,000 users in 85 countries across all industries rely on Conga applications to fully utilize their Salesforce data, including Hilton Worldwide, Schumacher Group, and CBRE.
The company is privately-held and based in Colorado with global operations in the UK and Australia. Learn more at getconga.com or follow Conga on Twitter: @getconga .
